On 2/14/07, Paul Downey <paul.downey@...> wrote:
> What worries me most about REST is that it isn't testable.

Eeek!  REST is most definitely testable.  See sec 5 of Roy's
dissertation for the tests (constraints).

I agree that calling a Java API "RESTful" is a misnomer though.  If it
was described as "supporting RESTful application development", that
would be better.

Mark.
